trans-unit.source: Represents a control that displays hierarchical data in a tree structure that has items that can expand and collapse.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle que exibe dados hierárquicos em uma estrutura de árvore que contém itens que podem expandir e recolher.

trans-unit.source: TreeView is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: TreeView é um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, que significa que ele pode conter uma coleção de objetos de qualquer tipo (como cadeia de caracteres, imagem ou painel).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a simple TreeView.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra um modo de exibição de árvore simple.

trans-unit.source: ![TreeView illustration](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView illustration") The contents of a TreeView are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controls that can contain rich content, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> controls.
trans-unit.target: ![Ilustração de TreeView](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView ilustração") o conteúdo de um modo de exibição de árvore é <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>controles que podem conter conteúdo formatado, tais como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> can contain one or more <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> objects as its descendants.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>pode conter um ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>objetos como seus descendentes.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>

trans-unit.source: A TreeView is defined as a hierarchy of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um modo de exibição de árvore é definido como uma hierarquia de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>

trans-unit.source: A TreeView can populate its tree by binding to a data source and using <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um modo de exibição de árvore pode preencher sua árvore associação a uma fonte de dados e usando <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Examples of data sources include <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> and <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> objects.
trans-unit.target: Exemplos de fontes de dados <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>e <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>objetos.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> </xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>

trans-unit.source: Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues.
trans-unit.target: Exibir um grande número de itens pode causar problemas de desempenho.

trans-unit.source: See [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [otimizando o desempenho: controles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: To improve the performance of a TreeView, see [How to: Improve the Performance of a TreeView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para melhorar o desempenho de um modo de exibição de árvore, consulte [como: melhorar o desempenho de um modo de exibição de árvore](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about the TreeView control, see the [TreeView Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o controle TreeView, consulte o [visão geral de TreeView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A TreeView has a limited number of levels.
trans-unit.target: Um modo de exibição de árvore tem um número limitado de níveis.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the TreeView Control To apply the same property settings to multiple TreeView controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Personalizando o controle TreeView para aplicar as mesmas configurações de propriedade para vários controles de TreeView, use o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Você pode modificar o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>para que o controle uma aparência exclusiva.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the TreeView, see [TreeView Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver as partes e os estados que são específicos para o modo de exibição de árvore, consulte [modelos e estilos de TreeView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controle podem ser definidas pelo estilo padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo padrão, a propriedade pode ser alterada de seu valor padrão quando o controle é exibido no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo padrão é determinado pelo qual tema de área de trabalho é usado quando o aplicativo está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [padrão WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in TreeView control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Definir uma propriedade visual só terá efeito se essa propriedade é presente no modelo padrão do controle TreeView e é definida usando um.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Você pode encontrar uma lista de propriedades visuais na seção "Alterando o Visual estrutura de um controle de" [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Expands the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> control and all its child <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: Expande especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> controle e todos os seus filhos <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> elementos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> to expand.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> para expandir.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> and all its child elements were expanded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> e todos os seus elementos filho foram expandido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> to use to display content.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> usar para exibir o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> to use as a container for content.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> para usar como um contêiner para conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> can scroll.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref> pode rolar.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> because the control has a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> in its style.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> porque o controle tem um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> no seu estilo.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified item is its own container or can be its own container.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o item especificado é seu próprio contêiner ou pode ser seu próprio contêiner.

trans-unit.source: The object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser avaliada.

trans-unit.source: if item is a ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if item is a ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Defines an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Define uma <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus"> </xref> eventos roteados.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for an <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged"></xref> event when the keyboard focus changes for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para um <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged"> </xref> eventos quando muda o foco do teclado para um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged"></xref> event that occurs when there is a change in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged"> </xref> evento que ocorre quando há uma alteração no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> evento para um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This implementation sets <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true` if one of the following keys is pressed together with the CTRL key: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação define <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>para `true` se uma das seguintes chaves é pressionada junto com a tecla CTRL:- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key></xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged"></xref> event when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged"> </xref> eventos quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*>alterações de valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*>

trans-unit.source: The event data that the parameter `e` provides contains an <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de evento que o parâmetro `e` fornece contém um <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to the item that was previously selected, or is set to `null` if there is no previously selected item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é definido como o item tiver sido selecionado ou está definido como `null` se não houver nenhum item selecionado anteriormente.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to the newly selected item, or is set to `null` if no new item is selected.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>está definido para o item selecionado recentemente ou é definido como `null` se nenhum novo item é selecionado.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Provides the item that was previously selected and the item that is currently selected for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece o item selecionado anteriormente e o item atualmente selecionado para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the selected item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o item selecionado em uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedItem property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control is a read-only property and is set to an item when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A> property value of the item <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SelectedItem no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>controle é uma propriedade somente leitura e é definido como um item quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A>valor de propriedade do item <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>é definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The selected object in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: O objeto selecionado no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref>, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se nenhum item selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*> changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*>alterações.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier Field|| |Routing Strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate|| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Roteadas informações de evento | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Estratégia de roteamento | Bolha | | Delegado | | # # Uso do atributo XAML ``` ```

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged"> </xref> eventos roteados.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the property that is the specified by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath*> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da propriedade que é especificado por <> </> *> para o <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A> property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the SelectedValue property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A>propriedade especifica o caminho para a propriedade que é usada para determinar o valor da propriedade SelectedValue.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, assume that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> is bound to a collection of objects of type `Employee`, which has two properties called `EmployeeName` and `EnployeeNumber`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>é associado a uma coleção de objetos do tipo `Employee`, que tem duas propriedades chamadas `EmployeeName` e `EnployeeNumber`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> to display the value of `EmployeeName` in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> and set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A> to `"EmployeeNumber"` to have SelectedValue return the value of `EmployeeNumber`.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar um <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate>para exibir o valor de `EmployeeName` no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>e defina <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A>para `"EmployeeNumber"` ter SelectedValue retornar o valor de `EmployeeNumber`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedValue property is a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SelectedValue é uma propriedade somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: To change the value of a selected item in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o valor de um item selecionado em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A>propriedade para acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The value of the property that is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath*> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade que é especificado pelo <> </> *> para o <> </> *>, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se nenhum item selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path that is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue*> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*> in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caminho que é usado para obter o <> </> *> do <> </> *> em uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedValuePath property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SelectedValuePath Especifica o caminho para a propriedade que é usado para determinar o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, assume that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> is bound to a collection of objects of type `Employee`, which has two properties called `EmployeeName` and `EnployeeNumber`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>é associado a uma coleção de objetos do tipo `Employee`, que tem duas propriedades chamadas `EmployeeName` e `EnployeeNumber`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> to display the value of `EmployeeName` in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> and set SelectedValuePath to `"EmployeeNumber"` to have <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> return the value of `EmployeeNumber`.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar um <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate>para exibir o valor de `EmployeeName` no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>e defina SelectedValuePath como `"EmployeeNumber"` ter <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A>retornar o valor de `EmployeeNumber`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
